QuestData.Title: The Road of Pain
QuestData.Description:
My people continue to be captured and hauled into de blood trolls' village for de slaughter, to be used as fuel for their dark rituals.
Just ahead, I can see some of de captives who fell along de path. I hear their cries as de blood trolls perform their vile rituals upon dem.
We cannot leave my people to die in de swamp, $n!
Take dese bandages and save any Zandalari you encounter down dere.
